tasks.task: Installing ribbon boards for a structure.
subtasks: Determining the appropriate drill bits for cutting through 2x6 wood and poles.
Using a generator to power an electrical drill for drilling holes.
Cutting 16-foot 2x6 planks in half due to difficulty in butting them up on poles.
Installing connecting boards on the back to join the two halves of the 2x6 planks.

tasks.task: Constructing another side of the structure.
subtasks: Replicating the installation process on the opposite side of the structure.

tasks.task: Preparing for the assembly of end frames.
subtasks: Addressing the challenges and complexities associated with assembling the end frames.
